description: Splits values in a column into a number of columns using a specified separator to determine where to make each split.

input.name: source
input.description: The name of the column to be split.

input.name: separator
input.description:
The separator text, or regular expression, which denotes the points at which each split should occur.
The separator is treated a regular expression if it begins and ends with `/`.

input.name: columns
input.description: The list of columns to be added.
